name: route-codegen
description: Route generator written in Typscript for React Router, NextJS, NodeJS and more

scripts.generate:sample: rm -rf ./sample/output && rm -rf ./sample/output-with-origins && yarn --silent build && node dist/bin/route-codegen.js --stacktrace --verbose --config sample/routegen.yml && PRIMARY_DOMAIN=domain.com node dist/bin/route-codegen.js --stacktrace --verbose --config sample/routegen-with-origins.yml && yarn --silent format:sample --loglevel silent
